cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 30 miles south of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving northeast along the North Carolina coast, then accelerating offshore toward the Canadian Maritimes
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Cape Hatteras, NC (brush / possible landfall along Outer Banks)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Main impacts now focused from the North Carolina coast north-eastward toward the Mid-Atlantic and New England; only residual swells along the northeast Florida coast
weather_observation.wind: No significant winds expected; residual breezes below gale force only
weather_observation.other_hazards: Persistent high surf and rip currents along northeast Florida beaches
